Literature.Title: Cloning and Characterization of Antimicrobial Peptide, Hepcidin in Medium Carp, Puntius sarana
Literature.Author: Das A, Mohapatra A, Sahoo PK

Literature.Title: Teleost antimicrobial peptide hepcidin contributes to host defense of goldfish (Carassius auratus L.) against Trypanosoma carassii.
Literature.Author: Xie J, Obiefuna V, Hodgkinson JW, McAllister M, Belosevic M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Aeromonas hydrophila(MBC=17.3µM),Edwardsiella tarda(MBC=17.3µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=17.3µM),Pseudomonas putida(MBC=17.3µM),Vibrio alginolyticus(no activity data),Vibrio harveyi(no activity data),Escherichia coli(MBC=17.3µM),Acinetobacter baumannii(no activity data),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=17.3µM),Trypanosoma carassii(20-30% Killing=10µM),Trypanosoma carassii(30-40% Killing=50µM)
